title: Joe Mazzulla has expected response when asked about Celtics tanking this year
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics “I would be very offended.

Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe By Conor Ryan October 30, 2025 | 6:25 PM 2 minutes to read The Boston Celtics have bounced back after an 0-3 start to the 2025-26 season with two consecutive wins, including a blowout victory over one of the top contenders in the Eastern Conference in the Cavaliers on Wednesday night.

title: FBI arrests man accused of using explosives on Woburn ATM
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News Christopher Silva, 43, was arrested Wednesday morning at his Stoneham home by the FBI Boston’s Violent Crimes Task Force.

By Sana Muneer October 30, 2025 | 6:10 PM 1 minute to read A Stoneham man was arrested and federally charged Wednesday after allegedly placing an explosive device on an ATM in Woburn in early September, police said.
Christopher Silva, 43, was arrested Wednesday morning at his Stoneham home by the FBI Boston’s Violent Crimes Task Force.

title: Planned West Roxbury homeless housing site is still riling residents. Here’s what to know.
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News A state contractor plans to transform a vacant West Roxbury nursing home into housing for homeless families.
The neighborhood is split.
The property at 5 Redlands Road in West Roxbury has been vacant since 2021, when the nursing home operating there closed its doors.
